title: Silky Tobacco Lost Mary Tappo Prefilled Pods
description: Lost Mary Tappo Silky Tobacco Pre-filled Replacement Pods provide vapers with an unparalleled experience. Unlike traditional tobacco blends the Silky Tobacco Lost Mary Tappo pods offer a slightly lighter tobacco taste combined with mild woody undertones to create a true tobacco taste like no other. This pack of Lost Mary Tappo pods is made up of two 2ml replacement pods; each 2ml pod has been prefilled with an intensely flavoursome nic salt vape liquid featuring a 20mg/2% nicotine strength. The Lost Mary Tappo pods are compatible with the Tappo Pod Kit by Lost Mary . Using the Tappo pods couldnâ€™t be simpler - simply push in the bottom of the Tappo pod and wait for around 60 seconds before slotting your new pod into the Tappo vape. The Lost Mary Tappo pods last for a maximum of 600 puffs per pod - once the Tappo Lost Mary pod is empty and the e-liquid has been used up, you will need to remove the pod and replace it with a new one. The Lost Mary Tappo pre-filled pods are a pack of two pods and as such they allow customers to enjoy up to 1200 puffs of pure flavour (per pack) - this means that each pack should last for approximately the same amount of time as 2 single use vapes - due to this the Lost Mary pods are a cheap, convenient substitute to disposable vapes . The Lost Mary Tappo replacement pods are available in more than 25 different flavours , with each based on the same popular flavours as the best selling BM600 disposable vapes - there are also new flavours still being released! Lost Mary Tappo Flavours: Apple Watermelon Banana Ice Blue Razz Blue Sour Raspberry Cherry Cola Cherry Ice Double Apple Grape Kiwi PassionFruit Guava Lemon Ice Lemon and Lime Maryturbo Mix Berries Peach Ice Pineapple Ice Pineapple PassionFruit Lemon Red Cherry Silky Tobacco Spearmint Strawberry Ice Strawberry Raspberry Triple Mango Tropical Fruit USA Mix Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Features: Flavour : Tobacco Pod Capacity : 2ml Nicotine Strength : 20mg (2%) Nicotine Type : Nicotine Salts TPD Compliant Prefilled Pods Compatible with Lost Mary Tappo Pod Kit Lost Mary Tappo Package Contains: 2x Lost Mary Tappo Silky Tobacco Pre-filled Replacement Pods
